tiled.io
Class TMXMapReader

java.lang.Object
  tiled.io.TMXMapReader

public class TMXMapReader
extends java.lang.Object

The standard map reader for TMX files. Supports reading .tmx, .tmx.gz and *.tsx files.

readProperties

private static void readProperties(org.w3c.dom.NodeList children,
                                   java.util.Properties props)
Reads properties from amongst the given children. When a "properties" element is encountered, it recursively calls itself with the children of this node. This function ensures backward compatibility with tmx version 0.99a. Support for reading property values stored as character data was added in Tiled 0.7.0 (tmx version 0.99c).

Parameters:
children - the children amongst which to find properties
props - the properties object to set the properties of

checkRoot

public static boolean checkRoot(java.lang.String filename)
This utility function will check the specified string to see if it starts with one of the OS root designations. (Ex.: '/' on Unix, 'C:' on Windows)

Parameters:
filename - a filename to check for absolute or relative path
Returns:
true if the specified filename starts with a filesystem root, false otherwise.
